00115 #define TP_ARTIST_NAME_LEN 255
00116 #define TP_ALBUM_NAME_LEN  255
00117 #define TP_TRACK_NAME_LEN  255
00118 #define TP_ID_LEN           40
00119 #define TP_FORMAT_LEN       32
00120 #define TP_COUNTRY_LEN       3
00121 typedef struct _metadata_t
00122 {
00123     char          artist[TP_ARTIST_NAME_LEN];
00124     char          sortName[TP_ARTIST_NAME_LEN];
00125     char          album[TP_ALBUM_NAME_LEN];
00126     char          track[TP_TRACK_NAME_LEN];
00127     int           trackNum;
00128     int           totalInSet;
00129     int           variousArtist;
00130     int           nonAlbum;
00131     char          artistId[TP_ID_LEN];   
00132     char          albumId[TP_ID_LEN];   
00133     char          trackId[TP_ID_LEN];
00134     char          fileTrm[TP_ID_LEN];
00135     char          albumArtistId[TP_ID_LEN];
00136     unsigned long duration;
00137     TPAlbumType   albumType;
00138     TPAlbumStatus albumStatus;
00139     char          fileFormat[TP_FORMAT_LEN];
00140     int           releaseYear, releaseDay, releaseMonth;
00141     char          releaseCountry[TP_COUNTRY_LEN];
00142 
00143     // This is only used in case of TRM collision
00144     int           numTRMIds;
00145 } metadata_t;
00146 
00147 
00154 typedef struct _artistresult_t
00155 {
00156     int   relevance;
00157     char  name[TP_ARTIST_NAME_LEN], sortName[TP_ARTIST_NAME_LEN];
00158     char  id[TP_ID_LEN];
00159 } artistresult_t;
00160 
00161 
00168 typedef struct _albumresult_t
00169 {
00170     int             relevance;
00171     char            name[TP_ALBUM_NAME_LEN];
00172     char            id[TP_ID_LEN];
00173     int             numTracks, numCDIndexIds;
00174     int             isVA;
00175     int             isNA;
00176     TPAlbumStatus   status;
00177     TPAlbumType     type;
00178     int             releaseYear, releaseDay, releaseMonth;
00179     char            releaseCountry[3];
00180     artistresult_t  artist;
00181 } albumresult_t;
00182 
00190 typedef struct _albumtrackresult_t
00191 {
00192     int             relevance;
00193     char            name[TP_ALBUM_NAME_LEN];
00194     char            id[TP_ID_LEN];
00195     int             numTRMIds, trackNum;
00196     unsigned long   duration;
00197     artistresult_t  artist;
00198     albumresult_t   album;
00199 } albumtrackresult_t;
